remarks: Value of ` V ` in terms of value of ` Q ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem13.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem13.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem13.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem13.p $e |- P = ( m e. NN |-> { p e. ( RR ^m ( 0 ... m ) ) | ( ( ( p ` 0 ) = ( A + X ) /\ ( p ` m ) = ( B + X ) ) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ m ) ( p ` i ) < ( p ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) } ) $.
fourierdlem13.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN ) $.
fourierdlem13.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. ( P ` M ) ) $.
fourierdlem13.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( 0 ... M ) ) $.
fourierdlem13.q $e |- Q = ( i e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( ( V ` i ) - X ) ) $.
fourierdlem13 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Q ` I ) = ( ( V ` I ) - X ) /\ ( V ` I ) = ( X + ( Q ` I ) ) ) ) $.
$d A m p $.
$d B m p $.
$d I i $.
$d M i m p $.
$d V i p $.
$d X i m p $.
$d i ph $.
